name: Venomfang

personality.tactics: Smart enough to retreat when outmatched. Will remember party for future revenge.

arrival: Recently claimed tower while searching Neverwinter Wood for lair. Killed 2 giant spiders that lived there.
lair: Tower with partially collapsed roof (allows entry/exit). Former wizard's library, 40 ft high ceiling.
cottage: Adjacent cottage (dusty furniture in webbing, nothing valuable)

tactics.discovery: Lurks near west end of bridges. Listens to intruders.
tactics.combat: Uses breath weapon, then melee. Strategic positioning.
tactics.retreat: If reduced to half HP (68), climbs to tower top and flies away. Will return for revenge later (DM choice).

treasure: Old wooden chest: 800 sp, 150 gp, 4 silver goblets with moonstones (60 gp each), scroll misty step, scroll lightning bolt, +1 battleaxe 'Hew' (deals max damage vs plants/wood objects, rusty-looking, inscribed 'Hew' in Dwarvish, hilt = bird of prey, wielder uneasy in forests)
xp: 2000 if driven off, 3900 if slain (unlikely at level 3)
